org.springframework.kafka.support.serializer

Class ErrorHandlingDeserializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.kafka.support.serializer.ErrorHandlingDeserializer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - class of the entity, representing messages
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.Deserializer<T>, org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.ExtendedDeserializer<T>
    Deprecated. 
    in favor of ErrorHandlingDeserializer2.

    @Deprecated
public class ErrorHandlingDeserializer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.ExtendedDeserializer<T>
    Delegating key/value deserializer that catches exceptions, returning them in the consumer record.
    Since:
    2.2
    Author:
    Gary Russell, Artem Bilan
